title: Gifting help
body:
trying to send a gift to a friend and keep getting same error message. "an error has occurred. sorry, the system has experienced an error. Please contact lol_en@riotgames.com"

and yes we both meet lvl requirements, haven't sent/received gift limit and its been more than 24 hours.
also i have already sent an email but i know forums can be faster :P
any help would be appreciated

EDIT: also it is only for this specific friend, i can gift just fine to anyone else

replies.body:
Hmm...this does sound fairly odd.  Given that you already checked all of the qualifications and restrictions, the best thing to do is to wait for a response in your ticket. They can take a deep dive into your account and figure out why the system keeps popping up an error.

I wish I could give you better and quicker advice!  Just sit tight for now, help is on the way :)
I cannot open my LOL. ---> Update Failed <--- ? What to do ?{{champion:131}}
